00053 static void rna_Armature_update_data(Main *UNUSED(bmain), Scene *UNUSED(scene), PointerRNA *ptr)
00054 {
00055     ID *id = ptr->id.data;
00056 
00057     DAG_id_tag_update(id, 0);
00058     WM_main_add_notifier(NC_GEOM|ND_DATA, id);
00059     /*WM_main_add_notifier(NC_OBJECT|ND_POSE, NULL); */
00060 }

00063 static void rna_Armature_act_bone_set(PointerRNA *ptr, PointerRNA value)
00064 {
00065     bArmature *arm = (bArmature*)ptr->data;
00066 
00067     if (value.id.data == NULL && value.data == NULL) {
00068         arm->act_bone = NULL;
00069     }
00070     else {
00071         if (value.id.data != arm) {
00072             Object *ob = (Object *)value.id.data;
00073             
00074             if (GS(ob->id.name) != ID_OB || (ob->data != arm)) {
00075                 printf("ERROR: armature set active bone - new active doesn't come from this armature\n");
00076                 return;
00077             }
00078         }
00079         
00080         arm->act_bone = value.data;
00081         arm->act_bone->flag |= BONE_SELECTED;
00082     }
00083 }
00084 
00085 static void rna_Armature_act_edit_bone_set(PointerRNA *ptr, PointerRNA value)
00086 {
00087     bArmature *arm = (bArmature*)ptr->data;
00088 
00089     if (value.id.data == NULL && value.data == NULL) {
00090         arm->act_edbone = NULL;
00091     }
00092     else {
00093         if (value.id.data != arm) {
00094             /* raise an error! */
00095         }
00096         else {
00097             arm->act_edbone = value.data;
00098             ((EditBone *)arm->act_edbone)->flag |= BONE_SELECTED;
00099         }
00100     }
00101 }
00102 
00103 EditBone *rna_Armature_edit_bone_new(bArmature *arm, ReportList *reports, const char *name)
00104 {
00105     if (arm->edbo == NULL) {
00106         BKE_reportf(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Armature '%s' not in editmode, cant add an editbone", arm->id.name+2);
00107         return NULL;
00108     }
00109     return ED_armature_edit_bone_add(arm, name);
00110 }
00111 
00112 void rna_Armature_edit_bone_remove(bArmature *arm, ReportList *reports, EditBone *ebone)
00113 {
00114     if (arm->edbo == NULL) {
00115         BKE_reportf(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Armature '%s' not in editmode, cant remove an editbone", arm->id.name+2);
00116         return;
00117     }
00118 
00119     if (BLI_findindex(arm->edbo, ebone) == -1) {
00120         BKE_reportf(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Armature '%s' doesn't contain bone '%s'", arm->id.name+2, ebone->name);
00121         return;
00122     }
00123 
00124     ED_armature_edit_bone_remove(arm, ebone);
00125 }

00127 static void rna_Armature_update_layers(Main *bmain, Scene *UNUSED(scene), PointerRNA *ptr)
00128 {
00129     bArmature *arm = ptr->id.data;
00130     Object *ob;
00131 
00132     /* proxy lib exception, store it here so we can restore layers on file
00133        load, since it would otherwise get lost due to being linked data */
00134     for (ob = bmain->object.first; ob; ob = ob->id.next)
00135         if (ob->data == arm && ob->pose)
00136             ob->pose->proxy_layer = arm->layer;
00137 
00138     WM_main_add_notifier(NC_GEOM|ND_DATA, arm);
00139 }

00141 static void rna_Armature_redraw_data(Main *UNUSED(bmain), Scene *UNUSED(scene), PointerRNA *ptr)
00142 {
00143     ID *id = ptr->id.data;
00144 
00145     WM_main_add_notifier(NC_GEOM|ND_DATA, id);
00146 }

00148 static char *rna_Bone_path(PointerRNA *ptr)
00149 {
00150     Bone *bone = (Bone*)ptr->data;
00151     
00152     /* special exception for trying to get the path where ID-block is Object
00153      *  - this will be assumed to be from a Pose Bone...
00154      */
00155     if (ptr->id.data) {
00156         ID *id = (ID *)ptr->id.data;
00157         
00158         if (GS(id->name) == ID_OB)
00159             return BLI_sprintfN("pose.bones[\"%s\"].bone", bone->name);
00160     }
00161     
00162     /* from armature... */
00163     return BLI_sprintfN("bones[\"%s\"]", bone->name);
00164 }

00166 static IDProperty *rna_Bone_idprops(PointerRNA *ptr, int create)
00167 {
00168     Bone *bone = ptr->data;
00169 
00170     if (create && !bone->prop) {
00171         IDPropertyTemplate val = {0};
00172         bone->prop = IDP_New(IDP_GROUP, &val, "RNA_Bone ID properties");
00173     }
00174 
00175     return bone->prop;
00176 }

00190 static void rna_bone_layer_set(int *layer, const int *values)
00191 {
00192     int i, tot = 0;
00193 
00194     /* ensure we always have some layer selected */
00195     for (i = 0; i<32; i++)
00196         if (values[i])
00197             tot++;
00198     
00199     if (tot == 0)
00200         return;
00201 
00202     for (i = 0; i<32; i++) {
00203         if (values[i]) *layer |= (1<<i);
00204         else *layer &= ~(1<<i);
00205     }
00206 }
00207 
00208 static void rna_Bone_layer_set(PointerRNA *ptr, const int *values)
00209 {
00210     Bone *bone = (Bone*)ptr->data;
00211     rna_bone_layer_set(&bone->layer, values);
00212 }
00213 
00214 static void rna_Armature_layer_set(PointerRNA *ptr, const int *values)
00215 {
00216     bArmature *arm = (bArmature*)ptr->data;
00217     int i, tot = 0;
00218 
00219     /* ensure we always have some layer selected */
00220     for (i = 0; i<32; i++)
00221         if (values[i])
00222             tot++;
00223     
00224     if (tot == 0)
00225         return;
00226 
00227     for (i = 0; i<32; i++) {
00228         if (values[i]) arm->layer |= (1<<i);
00229         else arm->layer &= ~(1<<i);
00230     }
00231 }

00233 /* XXX depreceated.... old armature only animviz */
00234 static void rna_Armature_ghost_start_frame_set(PointerRNA *ptr, int value)
00235 {
00236     bArmature *data = (bArmature*)ptr->data;
00237     CLAMP(value, 1, (int)(MAXFRAMEF/2));
00238     data->ghostsf = value;
00239 
00240     if (data->ghostsf >= data->ghostef) {
00241         data->ghostef = MIN2(data->ghostsf, (int)(MAXFRAMEF/2));
00242     }
00243 }
00244 
00245 static void rna_Armature_ghost_end_frame_set(PointerRNA *ptr, int value)
00246 {
00247     bArmature *data = (bArmature*)ptr->data;
00248     CLAMP(value, 1, (int)(MAXFRAMEF/2));
00249     data->ghostef = value;
00250 
00251     if (data->ghostsf >= data->ghostef) {
00252         data->ghostsf = MAX2(data->ghostef, 1);
00253     }
00254 }
00255 /* XXX depreceated... old armature only animviz */

00257 static void rna_EditBone_name_set(PointerRNA *ptr, const char *value)
00258 {
00259     bArmature *arm = (bArmature*)ptr->id.data;
00260     EditBone *ebone = (EditBone*)ptr->data;
00261     char oldname[sizeof(ebone->name)], newname[sizeof(ebone->name)];
00262     
00263     /* need to be on the stack */
00264     BLI_strncpy_utf8(newname, value, sizeof(ebone->name));
00265     BLI_strncpy(oldname, ebone->name, sizeof(ebone->name));
00266     
00267     ED_armature_bone_rename(arm, oldname, newname);
00268 }

00278     BLI_strncpy(oldname, bone->name, sizeof(bone->name));
00279 
00280     ED_armature_bone_rename(arm, oldname, newname);
00281 }

00283 static void rna_EditBone_layer_set(PointerRNA *ptr, const int values[])

00289 static void rna_EditBone_connected_check(EditBone *ebone)
00290 {
00291     if (ebone->parent) {
00292         if (ebone->flag & BONE_CONNECTED) {
00293             /* Attach this bone to its parent */
00294             copy_v3_v3(ebone->head, ebone->parent->tail);
00295 
00296             if (ebone->flag & BONE_ROOTSEL)
00297                 ebone->parent->flag |= BONE_TIPSEL;
00298         }
00299         else if (!(ebone->parent->flag & BONE_ROOTSEL)) {
00300             ebone->parent->flag &= ~BONE_TIPSEL;
00301         }
00302     }
00303 }
00304 
00305 static void rna_EditBone_connected_set(PointerRNA *ptr, int value)
00306 {
00307     EditBone *ebone = (EditBone*)(ptr->data);
00308 
00309     if (value) ebone->flag |= BONE_CONNECTED;
00310     else ebone->flag &= ~BONE_CONNECTED;
00311 
00312     rna_EditBone_connected_check(ebone);
00313 }
00314 
00315 static PointerRNA rna_EditBone_parent_get(PointerRNA *ptr)
00316 {
00317     EditBone *data = (EditBone*)(ptr->data);
00318     return rna_pointer_inherit_refine(ptr, &RNA_EditBone, data->parent);
00319 }
00320 
00321 static void rna_EditBone_parent_set(PointerRNA *ptr, PointerRNA value)
00322 {
00323     EditBone *ebone = (EditBone*)(ptr->data);
00324     EditBone *pbone, *parbone = (EditBone*)value.data;
00325 
00326     if (parbone == NULL) {
00327         if (ebone->parent && !(ebone->parent->flag & BONE_ROOTSEL))
00328             ebone->parent->flag &= ~BONE_TIPSEL;
00329 
00330         ebone->parent = NULL;
00331         ebone->flag &= ~BONE_CONNECTED;
00332     }
00333     else {
00334         /* within same armature */
00335         if (value.id.data != ptr->id.data)
00336             return;
00337 
00338         /* make sure this is a valid child */
00339         if (parbone == ebone)
00340             return;
00341             
00342         for (pbone = parbone->parent; pbone; pbone = pbone->parent)
00343             if (pbone == ebone)
00344                 return;
00345 
00346         ebone->parent = parbone;
00347         rna_EditBone_connected_check(ebone);
00348     }
00349 }
00350 
00351 static void rna_EditBone_matrix_get(PointerRNA *ptr, float *values)
00352 {
00353     EditBone *ebone = (EditBone*)(ptr->data);
00354 
00355     float   delta[3], tmat[3][3], mat[4][4];
00356 
00357     /* Find the current bone matrix */
00358     sub_v3_v3v3(delta, ebone->tail, ebone->head);
00359     vec_roll_to_mat3(delta, ebone->roll, tmat);
00360     copy_m4_m3(mat, tmat);
00361     copy_v3_v3(mat[3], ebone->head);
00362 
00363     memcpy(values, mat, 16 * sizeof(float));
00364 }
00365 
00366 static void rna_Armature_editbone_transform_update(Main *bmain, Scene *scene, PointerRNA *ptr)
00367 {
00368     bArmature *arm = (bArmature*)ptr->id.data;
00369     EditBone *ebone = (EditBone*)ptr->data;
00370     EditBone *child, *eboflip;
00371     
00372     /* update our parent */
00373     if (ebone->parent && ebone->flag & BONE_CONNECTED)
00374         copy_v3_v3(ebone->parent->tail, ebone->head);
00375 
00376     /* update our children if necessary */
00377     for (child = arm->edbo->first; child; child = child->next)
00378         if (child->parent == ebone && (child->flag & BONE_CONNECTED))
00379             copy_v3_v3(child->head, ebone->tail);
00380 
00381     if (arm->flag & ARM_MIRROR_EDIT) {
00382         eboflip = ED_armature_bone_get_mirrored(arm->edbo, ebone);
00383 
00384         if (eboflip) {
00385             eboflip->roll = -ebone->roll;
00386 
00387             eboflip->head[0] = -ebone->head[0];
00388             eboflip->tail[0] = -ebone->tail[0];
00389             
00390             /* update our parent */
00391             if (eboflip->parent && eboflip->flag & BONE_CONNECTED)
00392                 copy_v3_v3(eboflip->parent->tail, eboflip->head);
00393             
00394             /* update our children if necessary */
00395             for (child = arm->edbo->first; child; child = child->next)
00396                 if (child->parent == eboflip && (child->flag & BONE_CONNECTED))
00397                     copy_v3_v3 (child->head, eboflip->tail);
00398         }
00399     }
00400 
00401     rna_Armature_update_data(bmain, scene, ptr);
00402 }
00403 
00404 static void rna_Armature_bones_next(CollectionPropertyIterator *iter)
00405 {
00406     ListBaseIterator *internal = iter->internal;
00407     Bone *bone = (Bone*)internal->link;
00408 
00409     if (bone->childbase.first)
00410         internal->link = (Link*)bone->childbase.first;
00411     else if (bone->next)
00412         internal->link = (Link*)bone->next;
00413     else {
00414         internal->link = NULL;
00415 
00416         do {
00417             bone = bone->parent;
00418             if (bone && bone->next) {
00419                 internal->link = (Link*)bone->next;
00420                 break;
00421             }
00422         } while (bone);
00423     }
00424 
00425     iter->valid = (internal->link != NULL);
00426 }

00431 static int rna_matrix_dimsize_3x3[] = {3, 3};

00433 static void rna_def_bone_common(StructRNA *srna, int editbone)
00434 {
00435     PropertyRNA *prop;
00436 
00437     /* strings */
00438     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "name", PROP_STRING, PROP_NONE);
00439     RNA_def_property_string_sdna(prop, NULL, "name");
00440     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Name", "");
00441     RNA_def_struct_name_property(srna, prop);
00442     if (editbone) RNA_def_property_string_funcs(prop, NULL, NULL, "rna_EditBone_name_set");
00443     else RNA_def_property_string_funcs(prop, NULL, NULL, "rna_Bone_name_set");
00444     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Armature_redraw_data");
00445 
00446     /* flags */
00447     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "layers", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_LAYER_MEMBER);
00448     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "layer", 1);
00449     RNA_def_property_array(prop, 32);
00450     if (editbone) RNA_def_property_boolean_funcs(prop, NULL, "rna_EditBone_layer_set");
00451     else RNA_def_property_boolean_funcs(prop, NULL, "rna_Bone_layer_set");
00452     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Layers", "Layers bone exists in");
00453     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Armature_redraw_data");
00454 
00455     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_connect", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00456     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", BONE_CONNECTED);
00457     if (editbone) RNA_def_property_boolean_funcs(prop, NULL, "rna_EditBone_connected_set");
00458     else RNA_def_property_clear_flag(prop, PROP_EDITABLE);
00459     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Connected", "When bone has a parent, bone's head is stuck to the parent's tail");
00460     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Armature_update_data");
00461     
00462     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_inherit_rotation", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00463     RNA_def_property_boolean_negative_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", BONE_HINGE);
00464     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Inherit Rotation", "Bone inherits rotation or scale from parent bone");
00465     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Armature_update_data");
00466     
00467     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_envelope_multiply", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00468     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", BONE_MULT_VG_ENV);
00469     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Multiply Vertex Group with Envelope",
00470                              "When deforming bone, multiply effects of Vertex Group weights with Envelope influence");
00471     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Armature_update_data");
00472     
00473     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_deform", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00474     RNA_def_property_boolean_negative_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", BONE_NO_DEFORM);
00475     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Deform", "Bone does not deform any geometry");
00476     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Armature_update_data");
00477     
00478     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_inherit_scale", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00479     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Inherit Scale", "Bone inherits scaling from parent bone");
00480     RNA_def_property_boolean_negative_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", BONE_NO_SCALE);
00481     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Armature_update_data");
00482 
00483     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_local_location", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00484     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Local Location", "Bone location is set in local space");
00485     RNA_def_property_boolean_negative_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", BONE_NO_LOCAL_LOCATION);
00486     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Armature_update_data");
00487     
00488     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "show_wire", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00489     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", BONE_DRAWWIRE);
00490     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Draw Wire",
00491                              "Bone is always drawn as Wireframe regardless of viewport draw mode "
00492                              "(useful for non-obstructive custom bone shapes)");
00493     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Armature_redraw_data");
00494     
00495     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_cyclic_offset", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00496     RNA_def_property_boolean_negative_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", BONE_NO_CYCLICOFFSET);
00497     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Cyclic Offset",
00498                              "When bone doesn't have a parent, it receives cyclic offset effects");
00499     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Armature_update_data");
00500     
00501     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "hide_select", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00502     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", BONE_UNSELECTABLE);
00503     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Selectable", "Bone is able to be selected");
00504     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Armature_redraw_data");
00505 
00506     /* Number values */
00507         /* envelope deform settings */
00508     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "envelope_distance", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00509     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "dist");
00510     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0.0f, 1000.0f);
00511     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Envelope Deform Distance", "Bone deformation distance (for Envelope deform only)");
00512     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Armature_update_data");
00513     
00514     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "envelope_weight", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00515     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "weight");
00516     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0.0f, 1000.0f);
00517     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Envelope Deform Weight", "Bone deformation weight (for Envelope deform only)");
00518     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Armature_update_data");
00519     
00520     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "head_radius", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_UNSIGNED);
00521     if (editbone) RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Armature_editbone_transform_update");
00522     else RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Armature_update_data");
00523     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "rad_head");
00524         /* XXX range is 0 to lim, where lim= 10000.0f*MAX2(1.0, view3d->grid); */
00525     /*RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0, 1000); */
00526     RNA_def_property_ui_range(prop, 0.01, 100, 0.1, 3);
00527     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Envelope Head Radius", "Radius of head of bone (for Envelope deform only)");
00528     
00529     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "tail_radius", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_UNSIGNED);
00530     if (editbone) RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Armature_editbone_transform_update");
00531     else RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Armature_update_data");
00532     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "rad_tail");
00533         /* XXX range is 0 to lim, where lim= 10000.0f*MAX2(1.0, view3d->grid); */
00534     /*RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0, 1000); */
00535     RNA_def_property_ui_range(prop, 0.01, 100, 0.1, 3);
00536     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Envelope Tail Radius", "Radius of tail of bone (for Envelope deform only)");
00537     
00538         /* b-bones deform settings */
00539     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "bbone_segments", PROP_INT, PROP_NONE);
00540     RNA_def_property_int_sdna(prop, NULL, "segments");
00541     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 1, 32);
00542     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "B-Bone Segments", "Number of subdivisions of bone (for B-Bones only)");
00543     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Armature_update_data");
00544     
00545     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "bbone_in", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00546     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "ease1");
00547     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0.0f, 2.0f);
00548     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "B-Bone Ease In", "Length of first Bezier Handle (for B-Bones only)");
00549     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Armature_update_data");
00550     
00551     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "bbone_out", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00552     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "ease2");
00553     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0.0f, 2.0f);
00554     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "B-Bone Ease Out", "Length of second Bezier Handle (for B-Bones only)");
00555     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Armature_update_data");
00556 
00557     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "bbone_x", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00558     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "xwidth");
00559     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0.0f, 1000.0f);
00560     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "B-Bone Display X Width", "B-Bone X size");
00561     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Armature_update_data");
00562     
00563     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "bbone_z", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00564     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "zwidth");
00565     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0.0f, 1000.0f);
00566     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "B-Bone Display Z Width", "B-Bone Z size");
00567     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Armature_update_data");
00568 }
00569 
00570 /* err... bones should not be directly edited (only editbones should be...) */
00571 static void rna_def_bone(BlenderRNA *brna)
00572 {
00573     StructRNA *srna;
00574     PropertyRNA *prop;
00575     
00576     srna = RNA_def_struct(brna, "Bone", NULL);
00577     RNA_def_struct_ui_text(srna, "Bone", "Bone in an Armature datablock");
00578     RNA_def_struct_ui_icon(srna, ICON_BONE_DATA);
00579     RNA_def_struct_path_func(srna, "rna_Bone_path");
00580     RNA_def_struct_idprops_func(srna, "rna_Bone_idprops");
00581     
00582     /* pointers/collections */
00583         /* parent (pointer) */
00584     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "parent", PROP_POINTER, PROP_NONE);
00585     RNA_def_property_struct_type(prop, "Bone");
00586     RNA_def_property_pointer_sdna(prop, NULL, "parent");
00587     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Parent", "Parent bone (in same Armature)");
00588     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Armature_redraw_data");
00589     
00590         /* children (collection) */
00591     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "children", PROP_COLLECTION, PROP_NONE);
00592     RNA_def_property_collection_sdna(prop, NULL, "childbase", NULL);
00593     RNA_def_property_struct_type(prop, "Bone");
00594     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Children", "Bones which are children of this bone");
00595 
00596     rna_def_bone_common(srna, 0);
00597 
00598         /* XXX should we define this in PoseChannel wrapping code instead?
00599          *     But PoseChannels directly get some of their flags from here... */
00600     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "hide", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00601     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", BONE_HIDDEN_P);
00602     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Hide",
00603                              "Bone is not visible when it is not in Edit Mode (i.e. in Object or Pose Modes)");
00604     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Armature_redraw_data");
00605 
00606     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "select", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00607     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", BONE_SELECTED);
00608     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Select", "");
00609     RNA_def_property_clear_flag(prop, PROP_ANIMATABLE);
00610     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Armature_redraw_data");
00611     
00612     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "select_head", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00613     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", BONE_ROOTSEL);
00614     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Select Head", "");
00615     RNA_def_property_clear_flag(prop, PROP_ANIMATABLE);
00616     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Armature_redraw_data");
00617     
00618     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "select_tail", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00619     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", BONE_TIPSEL);
00620     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Select Tail", "");
00621     RNA_def_property_clear_flag(prop, PROP_ANIMATABLE);
00622     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Armature_redraw_data");
00623 
00624     /* XXX better matrix descriptions possible (Arystan) */
00625     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "matrix", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_MATRIX);
00626     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "bone_mat");
00627     RNA_def_property_multi_array(prop, 2, rna_matrix_dimsize_3x3);
00628     RNA_def_property_clear_flag(prop, PROP_ANIMATABLE);
00629     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Bone Matrix", "3x3 bone matrix");
00630 
00631     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "matrix_local", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_MATRIX);
00632     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "arm_mat");
00633     RNA_def_property_multi_array(prop, 2, rna_matrix_dimsize_4x4);
00634     RNA_def_property_clear_flag(prop, PROP_ANIMATABLE);
00635     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Bone Armature-Relative Matrix", "4x4 bone matrix relative to armature");
00636 
00637     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "tail", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_TRANSLATION);
00638     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "tail");
00639     RNA_def_property_array(prop, 3);
00640     RNA_def_property_clear_flag(prop, PROP_ANIMATABLE);
00641     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Tail", "Location of tail end of the bone");
00642     RNA_def_property_ui_range(prop, -FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX, 1, RNA_TRANSLATION_PREC_DEFAULT);
00643 
00644     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "tail_local", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_TRANSLATION);
00645     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "arm_tail");
00646     RNA_def_property_array(prop, 3);
00647     RNA_def_property_clear_flag(prop, PROP_ANIMATABLE);
00648     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Armature-Relative Tail", "Location of tail end of the bone relative to armature");
00649     RNA_def_property_ui_range(prop, -FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX, 1, RNA_TRANSLATION_PREC_DEFAULT);
00650 
00651     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "head", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_TRANSLATION);
00652     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "head");
00653     RNA_def_property_array(prop, 3);
00654     RNA_def_property_clear_flag(prop, PROP_ANIMATABLE);
00655     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Head", "Location of head end of the bone relative to its parent");
00656     RNA_def_property_ui_range(prop, -FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX, 1, RNA_TRANSLATION_PREC_DEFAULT);
00657 
00658     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "head_local", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_TRANSLATION);
00659     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "arm_head");
00660     RNA_def_property_array(prop, 3);
00661     RNA_def_property_clear_flag(prop, PROP_ANIMATABLE);
00662     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Armature-Relative Head", "Location of head end of the bone relative to armature");
00663     RNA_def_property_ui_range(prop, -FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX, 1, RNA_TRANSLATION_PREC_DEFAULT);
00664 
00665     RNA_api_bone(srna);
00666 }
00667 
00668 static void rna_def_edit_bone(BlenderRNA *brna)
00669 {
00670     StructRNA *srna;
00671     PropertyRNA *prop;
00672     
00673     srna = RNA_def_struct(brna, "EditBone", NULL);
00674     RNA_def_struct_sdna(srna, "EditBone");
00675     RNA_def_struct_idprops_func(srna, "rna_EditBone_idprops");
00676     RNA_def_struct_ui_text(srna, "Edit Bone", "Editmode bone in an Armature datablock");
00677     RNA_def_struct_ui_icon(srna, ICON_BONE_DATA);
00678     
00679     RNA_define_verify_sdna(0); /* not in sdna */
00680 
00681     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "parent", PROP_POINTER, PROP_NONE);
00682     RNA_def_property_struct_type(prop, "EditBone");
00683     RNA_def_property_pointer_funcs(prop, "rna_EditBone_parent_get", "rna_EditBone_parent_set", NULL, NULL);
00684     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_EDITABLE);
00685     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Parent", "Parent edit bone (in same Armature)");
00686     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Armature_redraw_data");
00687     
00688     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "roll", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_ANGLE);
00689     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "roll");
00690     RNA_def_property_ui_range(prop, -M_PI * 2, M_PI * 2, 0.1, 2);
00691     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Roll", "Bone rotation around head-tail axis");
00692     RNA_def_property_clear_flag(prop, PROP_ANIMATABLE);
00693     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Armature_editbone_transform_update");
00694 
00695     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "head", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_TRANSLATION);
00696     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "head");
00697     RNA_def_property_array(prop, 3);
00698     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Head", "Location of head end of the bone");
00699     RNA_def_property_clear_flag(prop, PROP_ANIMATABLE);
00700     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Armature_editbone_transform_update");
00701 
00702     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "tail", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_TRANSLATION);
00703     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "tail");
00704     RNA_def_property_array(prop, 3);
00705     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Tail", "Location of tail end of the bone");
00706     RNA_def_property_clear_flag(prop, PROP_ANIMATABLE);
00707     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Armature_editbone_transform_update");
00708 
00709     rna_def_bone_common(srna, 1);
00710 
00711     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "hide", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00712     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", BONE_HIDDEN_A);
00713     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Hide", "Bone is not visible when in Edit Mode");
00714     RNA_def_property_clear_flag(prop, PROP_ANIMATABLE);
00715     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Armature_redraw_data");
00716 
00717     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "lock", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00718     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", BONE_EDITMODE_LOCKED);
00719     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Lock", "Bone is not able to be transformed when in Edit Mode");
00720     RNA_def_property_clear_flag(prop, PROP_ANIMATABLE);
00721     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Armature_redraw_data");
00722 
00723     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "select", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00724     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", BONE_SELECTED);
00725     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Select", "");
00726     RNA_def_property_clear_flag(prop, PROP_ANIMATABLE);
00727     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Armature_redraw_data");
00728 
00729     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "select_head", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00730     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", BONE_ROOTSEL);
00731     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Head Select", "");
00732     RNA_def_property_clear_flag(prop, PROP_ANIMATABLE);
00733     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Armature_redraw_data");
00734     
00735     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "select_tail", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00736     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", BONE_TIPSEL);
00737     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Tail Select", "");
00738     RNA_def_property_clear_flag(prop, PROP_ANIMATABLE);
00739     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Armature_redraw_data");
00740 
00741     /* calculated and read only, not actual data access */
00742     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "matrix", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_MATRIX);
00743     /*RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "");  *//* doesnt access any real data */
00744     RNA_def_property_multi_array(prop, 2, rna_matrix_dimsize_4x4);
00745     RNA_def_property_clear_flag(prop, PROP_EDITABLE);
00746     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_THICK_WRAP); /* no reference to original data */
00747     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Editbone Matrix", "Read-only matrix calculated from the roll (armature space)");
00748         /* TODO - this could be made writable also */
00749     RNA_def_property_float_funcs(prop, "rna_EditBone_matrix_get", NULL, NULL);
00750 
00751     RNA_api_armature_edit_bone(srna);
00752 
00753     RNA_define_verify_sdna(1);
00754 }

00783 /* armature.bones.* */
00784 static void rna_def_armature_edit_bones(BlenderRNA *brna, PropertyRNA *cprop)
00785 {
00786     StructRNA *srna;
00787     PropertyRNA *prop;
00788 
00789     FunctionRNA *func;
00790     PropertyRNA *parm;
00791 
00792     RNA_def_property_srna(cprop, "ArmatureEditBones");
00793     srna = RNA_def_struct(brna, "ArmatureEditBones", NULL);
00794     RNA_def_struct_sdna(srna, "bArmature");
00795     RNA_def_struct_ui_text(srna, "Armature EditBones", "Collection of armature edit bones");
00796 
00797     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "active", PROP_POINTER, PROP_NONE);
00798     RNA_def_property_struct_type(prop, "EditBone");
00799     RNA_def_property_pointer_sdna(prop, NULL, "act_edbone");
00800     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_EDITABLE);
00801     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Active EditBone", "Armatures active edit bone");
00802     /*RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Armature_act_editbone_update"); */
00803     RNA_def_property_pointer_funcs(prop, NULL, "rna_Armature_act_edit_bone_set", NULL, NULL);
00804 
00805     /* todo, redraw */
00806 /*      RNA_def_property_collection_active(prop, prop_act); */
00807 
00808     /* add target */
00809     func = RNA_def_function(srna, "new", "rna_Armature_edit_bone_new");
00810     RNA_def_function_flag(func, FUNC_USE_REPORTS);
00811     RNA_def_function_ui_description(func, "Add a new bone");
00812     parm = RNA_def_string(func, "name", "Object", 0, "", "New name for the bone");
00813     RNA_def_property_flag(parm, PROP_REQUIRED);
00814 
00815     /* return type */
00816     parm = RNA_def_pointer(func, "bone", "EditBone", "", "Newly created edit bone");
00817     RNA_def_function_return(func, parm);
00818 
00819     /* remove target */
00820     func = RNA_def_function(srna, "remove", "rna_Armature_edit_bone_remove");
00821     RNA_def_function_flag(func, FUNC_USE_REPORTS);
00822     RNA_def_function_ui_description(func, "Remove an existing bone from the armature");
00823     /* target to remove*/
00824     parm = RNA_def_pointer(func, "bone", "EditBone", "", "EditBone to remove");
00825     RNA_def_property_flag(parm, PROP_REQUIRED|PROP_NEVER_NULL);
00826 }
00827 
00828 static void rna_def_armature(BlenderRNA *brna)
00829 {
00830     StructRNA *srna;
00831     PropertyRNA *prop;
00832     
00833     static EnumPropertyItem prop_drawtype_items[] = {
00834         {ARM_OCTA, "OCTAHEDRAL", 0, "Octahedral", "Display bones as octahedral shape (default)"},
00835         {ARM_LINE, "STICK", 0, "Stick", "Display bones as simple 2D lines with dots"},
00836         {ARM_B_BONE, "BBONE", 0, "B-Bone", "Display bones as boxes, showing subdivision and B-Splines"},
00837         {ARM_ENVELOPE, "ENVELOPE", 0, "Envelope",
00838                        "Display bones as extruded spheres, showing deformation influence volume"},
00839         {ARM_WIRE, "WIRE", 0, "Wire", "Display bones as thin wires, showing subdivision and B-Splines"},
00840         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
00841     static EnumPropertyItem prop_vdeformer[] = {
00842         {ARM_VDEF_BLENDER, "BLENDER", 0, "Blender", "Use Blender's armature vertex deformation"},
00843         {ARM_VDEF_BGE_CPU, "BGE_CPU", 0, "BGE", "Use vertex deformation code optimized for the BGE"},
00844         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
00845     static EnumPropertyItem prop_ghost_type_items[] = {
00846         {ARM_GHOST_CUR, "CURRENT_FRAME", 0, "Around Frame",
00847                         "Display Ghosts of poses within a fixed number of frames around the current frame"},
00848         {ARM_GHOST_RANGE, "RANGE", 0, "In Range", "Display Ghosts of poses within specified range"},
00849         {ARM_GHOST_KEYS, "KEYS", 0, "On Keyframes", "Display Ghosts of poses on Keyframes"},
00850         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
00851     static const EnumPropertyItem prop_pose_position_items[] = {
00852         {0, "POSE", 0, "Pose Position", "Show armature in posed state"},
00853         {ARM_RESTPOS, "REST", 0, "Rest Position", "Show Armature in binding pose state (no posing possible)"},
00854         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
00855     
00856     srna = RNA_def_struct(brna, "Armature", "ID");
00857     RNA_def_struct_ui_text(srna, "Armature",
00858                            "Armature datablock containing a hierarchy of bones, usually used for rigging characters");
00859     RNA_def_struct_ui_icon(srna, ICON_ARMATURE_DATA);
00860     RNA_def_struct_sdna(srna, "bArmature");
00861     
00862     /* Animation Data */
00863     rna_def_animdata_common(srna);
00864     
00865     /* Collections */
00866     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "bones", PROP_COLLECTION, PROP_NONE);
00867     RNA_def_property_collection_sdna(prop, NULL, "bonebase", NULL);
00868     RNA_def_property_collection_funcs(prop, 0, "rna_Armature_bones_next", NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL);
00869     RNA_def_property_struct_type(prop, "Bone");
00870     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Bones", "");
00871     rna_def_armature_bones(brna, prop);
00872 
00873     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "edit_bones", PROP_COLLECTION, PROP_NONE);
00874     RNA_def_property_collection_sdna(prop, NULL, "edbo", NULL);
00875     RNA_def_property_struct_type(prop, "EditBone");
00876     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Edit Bones", "");
00877     rna_def_armature_edit_bones(brna, prop);
00878 
00879     /* Enum values */
00880     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "pose_position", PROP_ENUM, PROP_NONE);
00881     RNA_def_property_enum_bitflag_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag");
00882     RNA_def_property_enum_items(prop, prop_pose_position_items);
00883     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Pose Position", "Show armature in binding pose or final posed state");
00884     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Armature_update_data");
00885     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_LIB_EXCEPTION);
00886     
00887     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "draw_type", PROP_ENUM, PROP_NONE);
00888     RNA_def_property_enum_sdna(prop, NULL, "drawtype");
00889     RNA_def_property_enum_items(prop, prop_drawtype_items);
00890     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Draw Type", "");
00891     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Armature_redraw_data");
00892     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_LIB_EXCEPTION);
00893 
00894     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "deform_method", PROP_ENUM, PROP_NONE);
00895     RNA_def_property_enum_sdna(prop, NULL, "gevertdeformer");
00896     RNA_def_property_enum_items(prop, prop_vdeformer);
00897     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Vertex Deformer", "");
00898     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Armature_redraw_data");
00899     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_LIB_EXCEPTION);
00900     
00901 /* XXX depreceated ....... old animviz for armatures only */
00902     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "ghost_type", PROP_ENUM, PROP_NONE);
00903     RNA_def_property_enum_sdna(prop, NULL, "ghosttype");
00904     RNA_def_property_enum_items(prop, prop_ghost_type_items);
00905     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Ghost Type", "Method of Onion-skinning for active Action");
00906     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Armature_redraw_data");
00907     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_LIB_EXCEPTION);
00908 /* XXX depreceated ....... old animviz for armatures only    */
00909 
00910     /* Boolean values */
00911         /* layer */
00912     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "layers", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_LAYER_MEMBER);
00913     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "layer", 1);
00914     RNA_def_property_array(prop, 32);
00915     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Visible Layers", "Armature layer visibility");

01040 
01041 void RNA_def_armature(BlenderRNA *brna)
01042 {
01043     rna_def_armature(brna);
01044     rna_def_bone(brna);
01045     rna_def_edit_bone(brna);
01046 }
